install_msg: Thank you for installing the Adventure cog, based on the GoblinsComic Adventure Party cog by locastan. Unload the earlier version of this cog by using the [p]unload gobcog command before loading the adventure cog. Only applies to users upgrading from GobCog. There is no conversion available for users that were utilizing earlier versions of this cog - think of this as a fresh new adventure!
